seo.title: The AI models behind Minutes.AI
seo.description: Why Minutes.AI produces professional meeting minutes: our quality-first policy and current models (ChatGPT-5, Gemini 2.5 Pro).
seo.ogDescription: We disclose the AI models we use—ChatGPT-5 and Gemini 2.5 Pro—for clear, actionable, consistent minutes.

ld.headline: AI models used by Minutes.AI
ld.description: Minutes.AI prioritizes output quality and currently adopts ChatGPT-5 and Gemini 2.5 Pro to generate decision-ready minutes.

hero.h1: The AI models we use for Minutes.AI
hero.tagline: Not just any LLMs—we pick models that keep minutes clear and actionable. At the time of writing: ChatGPT-5 and Gemini 2.5 Pro.

philosophy.p1: Many apps choose models by price. We prioritize clarity, actionability, and consistency so readers always know the next step.
philosophy.p2: Great ingredients and a great kitchen don’t guarantee a great dish—craft matters. Model choice and prompts are tuned for professional minutes.

adopted.h2: Adopted models (at the time of writing)
items: ChatGPT-5 (OpenAI): strong reasoning, tone control, reliable structure for decision-ready minutes.
Gemini 2.5 Pro (Google): long-context coherence and robust key-point extraction.
adopted.foot: We continuously evaluate new models and switch when they exceed our quality bar.

image.caption: Minutes.AI selects models for clarity and actionability, not just cost.
